overview: Hot roommates Natalie Mars and Charlotte Sartre are always fighting over the ownership of their sex toys. This time, a double dildo is the contested item.  Ballerinas are competitive - that's just the name of the game. So when the stunning head ballerina Rubi Maxim tells her dancers Jenna Noelle and Natalie Mars that she will be choosing which of the two girls will get the lead role, the competition intensifies dramatically.  When the wild Izzy Wilde makes a nuisance of herself in front of her roommate, Johnny Hill and his girlfriend, Kenzie Taylor, she's scolded about all her shortcomings. Having caught Kenzie's attention, lusty Izzy decides to play peacemaker by saying she'll put the dishes away.  Just when dark haired Lydia Black seems like she's finally going to let trans goddess Jessy Dubai give her a facial, she intentionally cum dodges and mocks Jessy for missing.
title: Tantalizing Threesomes
